DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study designed to follow patients with metastatic or locally advanced and unresectable colorectal cancer who are receiving Avastin in combination with chemotherapy and whose cancer has been either previously untreated or treated <=4 months prior to enrollment.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Avastin With Chemotherapy for Treatment of Metastatic or Advanced and Unresectable Colorectal Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent and Authorization document Metastatic, or locally advanced and unresectable, adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum Receiving Avastin as a component of firstline chemotherapy Firstline chemotherapy plus Avastin initiated <=4 months prior to enrollment in the study Patients who have contraindications for treatment with Avastin (see the Avastin Package Insert) or who would incur excessive risks with Avastin treatment are ineligible for this study.
